main.name: Jisung Jung
main.description: I'm an aspiring data scientist and I can use python, R and cloud AI platform to analyze data
main.bio: Currently, I am working as a data analyst. I had managed millions of engineering data and project systems at plant construction field from 2006 to 2018. I majored in business administration both bachelor's and master´s degrees, also majored in double master's in business analytics degree. Contracted work for a freelance employee, I am executing quality data analysis by Python, R, and Oracle Database for manufacturing equipment and components in the SK Hynix. I am interested in retro styles of pop music, compact cameras, and arcade games.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Deep dive into modern data science to gain the analytical capability and business acumen to translate data into meaningful actions.

Study every business topic through a global lens, master working cross-culturally, leverage disruptive technologies to shape the future, and develop the deep self-awareness needed to lead effectively and with confidence.
Build a well-rounded foundation in business administration to recognize business problems and opportunities, to develop innovative responses to them.

work.title: Business Data Analyst, Analytic and Insights
work.description: Enhance analytical capabilities and AI power for components and equipment quality management in SK Hynix.

work.title: Head of Product Management, Startup member
work.description: Build travel inspiration and research focused mobile application and go-to-market strategy from ideation to launch.

work.title: Project IT Manager, Technical Document Specialist
work.description: Led for project IT administration and data management. Established and operated technical document control systems.
